entry.title: At Your Side
entry.summary:
Author: braceyourself

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,776Chapters: 2/7Kudos: 25

Summary: For a split second that lasts eons, Arthur exists in that horribly weightless space before gravity conquers, and then he's falling. Distantly, he hears Merlin cry out his name in panic, and then he’s bracing himself for impact. An impact that never comes. Silently hoping, begging, for anything but what he knows he’s about to see, Arthur turns his head to look. And sees Merlin, hand outstretched, and eyes ablaze with gold. *** Faced with the revelation of Merlin's secret and a sudden internal war between duty and sentiment, Arthur must make a decision that will affect both of their fates. And when Merlin is gravely injured, the time to make that decision rapidly dwindles. Arthur must quickly choose what matters most: the demands of the law, or those of his heart.

entry.title: Day Ten
entry.summary:
Author: Anonymous

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,631Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 2

Summary: Slavery has been outlawed in Camelot for generations, a fact Arthur holds as proof of his kingdom’s honor. But not every ally shares Camelot’s conscience. Cenred’s court reeks of cruelty, something Arthur can stomach only for the sake of peace for his people. So why can’t he look away from Cenred’s personal slave? And why can’t he bring himself to refuse Cenred’s offer to… sample what’s been offered? entry.title: Hidden in Plain Sight
entry.summary:
Author: The_green_fairy

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 56,960Chapters: 17/?Kudos: 213

Summary: When fem!Merlin is injured during a bandit attack, Arthur discovers his servant's most dangerous secret—she's a woman. entry.title: Two Sides of the Same Coin (A Merthur x Heartstopper AU)
entry.summary:
Author: Chaosbat7

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,840Chapters: 1/2Kudos: 3

Summary: Simply put, this fic sprung into existence when I originally thought that Arthur and Merlin reminded me a bit of Nick and Charlie, and the universe forced me to write this by showing me a comment saying they were "medieval heartstopper". This is a fic that is basically the entire story of Heartstopper, just with the characters from Merlin inserted. (There weren't enough Merlin characters to substitute everyone, though, so I just changed names for some people ((you'll see)) *Story/Characters/Dialogue belongs to the incredible Alice Oseman, and the creators of BBC's Merlin!*

entry.title: to protect a kingdom (is to protect you)
entry.summary:
Author: Katiebabyangel

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 86,501Chapters: 30/?Kudos: 393

Summary: Merlin isn't the first servant Arthur found a friend in. The daughter of one of his childhood nannies, Eira, has served as his maidservant her entire life. When Merlin is appointed as Arthur's permanent manservant, and the assignment goes well, Eira is reassigned - only no one asked for her to be reassigned. Eira's life spirals out of control, the new knights start to take advantage of their station, Merlin decides he needs to protect her, and Arthur is determined to figure out what's happened to leave a bad taste in his mouth without knowing Eira's been reassigned. Featuring good!Uther (as good as Uther can get), protective!Morgana, and Arthur's morally ambiguous attempts to keep both his servants alive and safe with guest appearances by various Knights of the Round Table! -Check notes for trigger warnings!

entry.title: Secrets, Burdens, and Other Things We Share
entry.summary:
Author: kiera_wesley

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,736Chapters: 2/7Kudos: 37

Summary: To say Arthur was having a terrible, horrible, no-good, very bad day was putting it lightly. It started out with the pixie in the pantry, which sounded like one of Gwaine’s inane drinking songs but was in actuality an unmitigated disaster of flour, chaos, flying apples, and wasted pastries……An unfortunate incident with a pixie leads to Arthur and Merlin swapping bodies for a day. When Merlin’s closely guarded secrets surface in the process, it’s up to Arthur to figure out how to proceed. Trust, love, protection, they’re all forms of the same thing, aren’t they? And what of secrets, burdens, and all the lies we keep to ourselves? This is a story about what would happen if we choose to pull off the veil and step, together, into the light.

entry.title: Right Through the Ages
entry.summary:
Author: talesfromthecryptid

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,794Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 0

Summary: Arthur, a young man raised by his sickly mother on stories of a great kingdom ruled by a great man after whom he was named, has spent the better part of his life researching the existence of this lost and oft-forgotten land. After receiving a mysterious letter simply signed with the initial M soon after his fifteenth birthday, along with inheriting a silver sword pendant after his mother's death only a few years later, that gave him few answers and even more questions, Arthur has been more dedicated than ever to discovering what destiny has awaited him through countless lifetimes.

entry.title: You are the father (And no I don't care that you weren't participant in the conception)
entry.summary:
Author: toaster_bob

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 12,821Chapters: 2/3Kudos: 29

Summary: "Half of her is Arthur." The dragon spoke calmly, which didn't match the slight curling of its mouth at all. It made Merlin uneasy. "And the other half..." "Is her mother?" Merlin figured, not really seeing why the dragon was actually grinning now. That was how children worked, no? One half father, the other half mother. That's how they were made. But the dragon made Merlin rethink his assumption as apparently, he seemed to be very, very wrong. "The other half is magic." The dragon waited for Merlin to react, but the young warlock didn't. With a disappointed huff, he added, as if it was the most obvious thing in the world, "Half of her is you, Merlin. You are magic." That did not add up on so many levels. And yet, Merlin didn't know how to contradict the dragons' statement. His vision blurred, his heart racing out of control. "I... I'm a mother now?!" "Merlin, no-" * Or: Merlin doesn't remember becoming a father, but oh well, he's wrong. And Arthur, of all people, seems to be his co-parent.

entry.title: Some and Now None of You
entry.summary:
Author: Isthisusernameavailableornot

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 158,635Chapters: 51/60Kudos: 1,415

Summary: "Let him think I hate him. If that’ll stop him from risking his neck for me over and over again, then it’s a sacrifice I don’t have to think twice about." — Arthur finds out Merlin has magic. He also finds out how often Merlin risked his life for him and so, he does the only thing he can think of to protect him: banishment. Hurt and angry, Merlin leaves and swears to not look back. But, when two years pass and Morgana shows up at Merlin’s door, urging him to fill Gaius’ position as Court Physician, Merlin agrees. He really doesn’t know why, but Arthur is sure Merlin would do just about anything to get on his nerves. Unprepared for the shock of seeing Merlin back in the castle, Arthur is forced to speed along his plans to lift the ban on magic. But between stubborn councilors, a mysterious plague, a still angry Merlin, and Morgana being Morgana, Arthur is fairly certain he’ll lose his mind before the first year of his reign even ends.

entry.title: Hide and Seek
entry.summary:
Author: InescapableConsequences

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 737Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 13

Summary: “I see how it is, have I not been giving you enough attention lately?” Merlin asked rhetorically, tugging at Arthur's hair to look into his eyes. “Merlin, please.” Arthur whispered, pleadingly. Merlin flipped the two of them, pressing Arthur against the wall. He crowded his space quickly, running his tongue against Arthur's neck and biting down.
